website_summaries.verdict: Old-fashioned charm and plenty of room for all of your favorite spices.
pros: Sturdy steel-wire construction with bronze finish
Adds decorative touch to your kitchen
cons: Must be attached to the wall
Design might not complement your kitchen

customer_reviews.title: Strong and well made rack!
customer_reviews.text: This product is excellent. I'm using it to hold all my painting supplies and it can hold a lot. Only one of the 3 shelves is holding 16 paint bottles. The unit I received is sturdy, the shelves are well made, and the bottom is perfectly flat so it will stand flat on a table. I didn't put anything fragile in mine so I hanged it using two 5 pound command tape hooks and it's holding up just fine. I own all kind of organization tools and racks and this one is by far my favorite in terms of quality. I highly recommend this.
customer_reviews.author: S

customer_reviews.title: More than a Spice Rack
customer_reviews.text: I found another great use for this. I did not want bedside tables next to my bed so I purchased this and hung it on the wall next to my bed. Top shelf I keep my remotes for the TV, VCR and Bed. the next two racks I keep a couple of books and a small writing notebook for those ideas you get in the middle of the night. Now my room looks larger and is not cluttered with a piece of furniture and it was MUCH cheaper.Love the style and the bronze finish.
customer_reviews.author: Christine

customer_reviews.title: Great space saver
customer_reviews.text: I freaking love these things. Not only did I get the 3-tier rack I also got the singles (which come as a pair). The 3-tier one is great for spices and such but I did not realize when ordering the single racks that they are actually slightly longer and quite deeper--I am able to get large vitamin bottles in them! These are perfect space savers for my tiny place and I love the way they look and function. Sturdy and simple to mount; job done in ten minutes with scrupulous measuring ;)
customer_reviews.author: April

customer_reviews.title: Good, sturdy shelf.
customer_reviews.text: Seems heavy duty and well made. Bronze-finish paint seems even. At 11 inches wide, it fits perfectly on the side of the cabinets flanking my sink adding much-needed additional storage for spices, oil bottles, etc. Four tabs welded to the back act to firmly mount this with included hardware; ships with mounting hardware for both wood cabinets or for hollow walls. Shelves are made from wire mesh, are 3 inches deep with about 6.5 inches vertically between the shelves.
customer_reviews.author: Big Man Mark

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for single sink super small bathroom vanity
customer_reviews.text: My daughter's bathroom is very small--her vanity is only a sink with no extra space. The bathroom is always a wreck because she doesn't have any place to put her stuff. A full size cabinet wouldn't fit; it would have hung out over the sink. This is perfect! I mounted it (myself without any problems) on the wall right beside the vanity and it doesn't stick out or seem crowded. It fits her deodorant, body sprays, etc. perfectly. The little ledges keep things from falling off. The black color is appealing. (I have oil-rubbed bronze fixtures and this doesn't clash. It's not the same color, but complimentary.) I would definitely buy this again. It came fully assembled.
customer_reviews.author: gina

customer_reviews.title: Im so annoyed
customer_reviews.text: OK, so I ordered one about a year ago. I loved it everything I wanted. Now I order one last week, it was bent and missing a piece. I firgued ooo its just a fluke, send it back, actually order another. These people sent me a worse item. What am I gonna do with this?? Two horrible pieces in a week. I'm digusted, thanks so much. Learnt my lesson, never again. To the garbage with this. Only wish I had pictures of the first one.
customer_reviews.author: Cheyenne

customer_reviews.title: Best spice rack ever!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought two of these because I use a lot of different spices in my household and could not be more happy with this product! It's beautiful to look at, holds a lot of spices per row (see picture), and is able to be mounted to the wall to provide more space in my kitchen. I absolutely LOVE these spice racks and would not change a single thing about them.
customer_reviews.author: Francisca A.

customer_reviews.title: hard to install
customer_reviews.text: This item looks good and in general, it is a good looking and sturdy rack. However, I must give an one star for overall rating because of the stupid installation design. The four nail fastener holes are located in a position that either a hand tool and/or electric drill are nearly unaccessible. It makes installation very difficult and messy.
customer_reviews.author: Taiyang

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed in Changed Design
customer_reviews.text: I bought one of these when they were sold in one solid piece. I liked it enough to order another one, but the second one came in two pieces that needed to be assembled. However, the metal posts that were supposed to be attached to adjacent metal posted were not machined with any holes to accept the screws. I returned that one and ordered a replacement. The replacement came, again needing assembly. The metal posts had the holes this time, but the threads were not properly machined and it was almost impossible to get the screw in. I managed to get it attached but am not very confident in its sturdiness. Very disappointed with the new design that requires assembly.
customer_reviews.author: GB

customer_reviews.title: Essential Oil Heaven
customer_reviews.text: I bought this rack because my essential oil collection was growing. This rack is the perfect size and right amount of space for the bottles, it's almost has if this rack was made for essential oils. The rack is also very beautiful so it is not an eye sore, goes very well with my bedroom decor. It was extremely easy to install. They do send a thoughtful little paper so you can make sure your rack is in line but honestly I did not use it, I always just eyeball. I would definitely recommend this to my other EO friends.
customer_reviews.author: Ronni

customer_reviews.title: Uneven shelves, crappy hardware
customer_reviews.text: The three levels of this spice rack are at different angles, so when the top shelf is level the bottom is not. The wall anchors they sent are ridiculously cheap. Two of them broke when I was just using my finger to press the tips into the hole while I reached for my hammer. The top collapsed on the third one, but luckily not completely so I was still able to make it work. Only one of the wall anchors actually worked the way they are supposed to. Overall the rack is functional, but I would not buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Becca

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size shelf for what I needed it for
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size shelf for what I needed it for. I live in a small space and was out of room. I attached this shelf to the outside of one of my kitchen cabinet doors to hold our boxes of tea. It holds 9 boxes of tea and there was just enough space at the end of each shelf to put the tiny bottles of honey we use with our teas. Good quality, very cute, already assembled . Just put in the 4 screws that attaches it where-ever you are hanging.
customer_reviews.author: rhonda

customer_reviews.title: Little kitchen helper
customer_reviews.text: This spice rack has been a perfect solution for my awkward little kitchen. The width was just right for hanging on one of my kitchen posts; which you can see in the photo. Holds a wide range of spice containers. We actually used picture hanging hooks to hang it, due to the post being mostly made of steel. No issues with weight or stability.
customer_reviews.author: Nikki V.

customer_reviews.title: Super space saver
customer_reviews.text: I love this shelving unit!!! The design of it is gorgeous! The dark brown color matches the theme & other furniture that's in my bathroom. It is very well crafted! All of my nail polishes fit perfectly on it with even an extra shelf left over for more storage! It helps with clearing up space for sure! If you are reorganizing anything in your home & could use this, I definitely recommend you buy it. I'm so happy that I did!
customer_reviews.author: Samantha Rose

customer_reviews.title: Practical for essential oil bottles
customer_reviews.text: I love this purchase. I use it to hold essential oils. I have over 40 oils plus multiple rollers and some sprays on it and there is still plenty of room, could probably hold at least 60 oils. The disadvantage is that the rack is somewhat stick so my glass oil bottles fall over easily, but I know the spices wouldn’t because my spray bottles dont. It’s well made and sturdy, but not heavy to worry about my walls. I installed with only nails and not anchors and seems fine now. It was easy to hang up because it came with a paper template of where the nails need placed. It’s sleek and stylish looking.
customer_reviews.author: Jessie P.

customer_reviews.title: Spice rack dice rack
customer_reviews.text: I play a lot of D&D (Dungeons and Dragons) and, because of that, I tend to be a bit of a dice dragon. With any dragon dice hoard, you eventually need a place to both store and display your pretties. This rack is perfect for a small hoard. I store my dice in old Spice Islands spice jars, so this was perfect for me. Now some of my pretties are out and on display, and easier to access than when they were in their chest. Probably going to need to get another one soon. Why do i have so many dice you might ask? Well, generally, they are cheaper than jewelry and I can use these more often.
customer_reviews.author: Steph Mehl

customer_reviews.title: This spice rack isn't just for spices
customer_reviews.text: The DecoBros spice rack isn't just for spices. My daughter lives in a very tiny apartment with no medicine cabinet, just a mirror. I installed this rack (very easily) in her bathroom to accommodate cosmetics, contact solution, etc. It's perfect - it keeps her minimal counter space clear, organizes her bathroom supplies, and looks very attractive. One of my better ideas!
customer_reviews.author: Darcy

customer_reviews.title: Arrived bent and damaged
customer_reviews.text: I’m really disappointed because this looked like such a cute rack but when it arrived the metal shelves were bent in, like someone had stepped on them. It took a lot of work to unbend them and the result looks just as tacky as when it was bent. Technically it holds my spice jars, it’s just ugly as sin now. I wish it had been treated better before it got to me.
customer_reviews.author: Rowan

customer_reviews.title: Must have tiny nail to modify it.
customer_reviews.text: I really like this shelf, but mine came in two parts. It was difficult to put together with the little screws it came with because the scroll part is too big to use a screw driver for the tiny screw. I had to modify it and used a tiny nail to put the to pieces together. I went back through the pictures, and I didn't notice any other ones in two pieces. This is definitely something for hanging on the wall. Overall, I love it, but it was a pain to hang up. I thought it was one piece.
customer_reviews.author: Christy Crawford

customer_reviews.title: Works, looks good
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy, decorative. Congress with screws with plastic "backs" (don't know there name of them) in case you have to use in your walls so the shelf don't fall off. I hung on there dude of my cabinet and reinforced on there inside with small pieces of wood to stabilize and compensate for thin cabinet wood. Holds about 6 spice jars each shelf. I have ALOT of spices and very little cabinet space since my house was built in mid 1970s. So i ordered another one so i can have the use of the cabinet door other things.
customer_reviews.author: HYPNOJADE

customer_reviews.title: Looks terrific in my kitchen
customer_reviews.text: I ordered two of these for spice racks in my kitchen. My only complaint is that on one of them, the holes at top on opposite sides did not line up correctly. One side was slightly longer than the other, thus resulting in a slight tilt. My jars lean slightly to one side on one of the racks. Other than that, they look great.
customer_reviews.author: KC_Reader

customer_reviews.title: Nice spice rack, but doesn’t assemble properly
customer_reviews.text: The spice rack looks great! The only problem I had was that it comes in 2 pieces, with 2 small screws & instructions to screw the two pieces together. The pre-drilled holes are not big enough for the screws that came with it, and it’s metal, so I can’t just drill a bigger hole to make them fit. I ended up getting two tiny black zip ties & just connecting the two pieces that way. Once the rack was hung on the wall & filled with spices you don’t notice the zip ties at all, but it’s just a little frustrating to have to do that instead of screw it together like it should be.
customer_reviews.author: Camsmama1218

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for nail polish too!
customer_reviews.text: This is perfect! I use it to hold my nail polish! It's very sturdy and beautiful. It's a little hard to mount because a drill can't really fit where the screws go but I managed.
customer_reviews.author: Mercy

customer_reviews.title: Installation design is bad.
customer_reviews.text: The hole's to install the screws are at the same level as the bracket that holds the spices or whatever you are putting in there. You can barely get a hammer in there let alone the drill. I basically had to use nails instead, mark the holes then nail the nails in, take the nails out then slide them into the holes because of the design flaw. Unless you own a super tiny drill, the screws are useless. Looks nice at least for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Tyler Frazier

customer_reviews.title: stands up to a hammer
customer_reviews.text: extremely well built product that is highly functional; my measurements in installation were 1/16th of an inch off...i thot i'll just hammer that so i don't have to re-drill...well, it didn't work, i had to re-drill. it is great for a smallish bathroom with limited storage for inside the linen closet...love it. has all my daily go-to's on it. why did i wait so long to purchase this?
customer_reviews.author: mel bell

customer_reviews.title: Cheaply made, terrible quality control, shelves not level. You get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.text: The product was easy enough to install with the provided leveling guide, however, while the holes are level, the individual shelves are NOT. They're not even parallel with each other, every shelf has its own angle. It looks and feels like it was made by a high school student as their first metal shop project. Would NOT recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: perfect for shot glasses
customer_reviews.text: it was cheap, easy to put together, and big enough for all our shot glasses. the baskets are wide enough that it fits our widest glasses and would do well for actual spices too. great buy, had been looking for a shelf for a long time and this fit the bill perfectly. nice quality and size for what it is. you will need some tools to install it, took me about 10 mins from box to installed
customer_reviews.author: J Swing

customer_reviews.title: Assembly wasn't as easy as other customers touted.
customer_reviews.text: It's attractive, holds a fair amount of spice jars. But if you have poor vision/cataracts and tremors in your hands, don't buy it till you've got a friend or family member to assemble it. I finally got it together and on the wall, after literally sweating and cursing. I might purchase the 2-pack of single racks later, since they don't have to be assembled--just hung on the wall.
customer_reviews.author: R Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Great quality, super sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Excellent price for the quality and craftsmanship. The color and size matched the description. It looks great hanging on the kitchen wall and I can't think of a single complaint. My only recommendation would be to add an extra 1/8th inch of space per rack to allow two standard size spice bottles to sit one in front of the other. The extra space on the shelf would enable more bottles to be held per shelf, but would probably look bulkier than I'd like. Therefore, this rack is great the way it is.
customer_reviews.author: Lit RoxTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Very nice, high-quality shelf! ❤️
customer_reviews.text: I love this shelf! ❤️ It is sturdy, very well made and was easy to hang. It came with two sets of screws, in different lengths, so that was nice to have an option on those... I hung it on my bathroom wall and tied some pretty crystal beads underneath the bottom shelf to dress it up a bit... It has a nice dark bronze finish to it and each shelf will hold items up to around 3” in depth... I’m very happy with this purchase! 👍😃
customer_reviews.author: Cindi M.

customer_reviews.title: Handy for small kitchens
customer_reviews.text: This spice rack is perfect for my small kitchen. By hanging it on the wall, an inside cabinet is freed up for other things. The rack was very difficult for me to install. There were no directions, although all the screws and anchors were included. My rack was warped, so that also made it harder to install. The capacity is very good. I recommend this spice rack.
customer_reviews.author: Louise D. Somes

customer_reviews.title: Not just for spices
customer_reviews.text: I bought it for a window mini-garden. It's deeper than most spice racks. HATE cooking, but love pretty green things!! Will grow herbs and all sorts of wonderful greenery/flora. Hopefully, some for the spring/summer garden. AND, once I realized how perfect it is, I'm now buying three more. Hence, a foursome in the small south facing kitchen window. I just have to figure out how to install them!!! That's nothing. Imagining and putting into practice is the most fun!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Well made, fits my 6.5 ounce BBQ collection nicely, comes with template.
customer_reviews.text: This is a good rack over all, quality is good for the price. For those interested the spice bottles in my picture are 5 inches tall and 2 inches wide and they fit fine. It is hard to tell from pictures some times and I was worried they would bee too tight to get in and out, it was not an issue. This rack also comes with a template to pre-drill your holes if you need it, a nice touch for a budget rack. I will be buying another one of these for my non BBQ spices.
customer_reviews.author: Zeuki1

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these to hold spices. While they came in a set of 2, and I wanted them to hang side by side, they are not exactly alike. They are close enough, but I couldn't hang them directly next to each other, or the slight differences are noticeable. Overall, however, they are nice and the shelves are roomy and they seem sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Fran in NC

customer_reviews.title: Great product! Worked well for my needs.
customer_reviews.text: Haven’t installed it yet, but it fits perfectly under my cabinet and is stable free standing currently. Purchased this to get my medicine bottles more organized. Was debating on purchasing more than one, but I wanted to see if the first would work for me before I took the plunge. It works very well! Showed up to me in perfect working outfit. Looks beautiful and cleans up my kitchen space!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, fair amount of room, minor flaw.
customer_reviews.text: This rack is quite sturdy and if good quality build. I wish it were just a bit deeper so that it would hold two rows of spice bottles, but that's on me for not paying closer attention to the dimensions. My only real complaint is where they placed the mounting tabs. They are directly behind the wire shelves making them difficult to get at with a power screwdriver. Make sure you have a long bit extension when you go to put this up or be prepared to screw it in by hand. They could have moved the tabs up about a 1/2" and this wouldn't have been an issue and wouldn't change the sturdiness of the unit in the least.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for more than just spices!
customer_reviews.text: Bought it to use in my bathroom for my hair products and some make up. Very sturdy and the right size for what I needed. Have not been disappointed in this companies products and have bought the mail sorter and other spice shelves. Will buy more from this company!
customer_reviews.author: Marie Thornton

customer_reviews.title: Spice Rack is a great value!
customer_reviews.text: I just love this spice rack! It was easy to put together and install (You'll need a Phillips head screwdriver) and holds all my spice jars, from small to large. Instructions assume you know how to install wall anchors. I didn't bother with them and it seems to be holding nicely. Time will tell, lol. Overall, it's a nice looking rack and I highly recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: FritzsPlace

customer_reviews.title: Listed as Bronze, Received in Black
customer_reviews.text: The racks are solid, easy to put up (4 mounting tabs, one at each corner) will never understand why everything you buy like this isn't built to fit up to your wall studs which are at 18 inch centers. Biggest beef is that they are listed as bronze and I received them in black. Not worth sending back as they are being installed in the pantry.
customer_reviews.author: SCS2

customer_reviews.title: Not a bad item for what it's worth
customer_reviews.text: Storage capacity is not a lot but does hold items I use most often. It frees up some space in the cupboard I use for spice storage. A little flimsy in construction and not assembled as carefully as I would have liked. Shelves are not quite level or accurately spaced. Not quite enough depth for double row placement of common spice containers. Staggering front to back helps with spacing. All in all it is useful and doesn't look bad on the wall with items stored.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin D.

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to install and looks great as a spice rack. I am very pleased of how sturdy it is too. It looks nice on the wall. I suggest if you can’t use nails to secure this to the wall to use 3M command adhesive wall hooks that can carry enough weight for your needs. Overall a great multipurpose item!
customer_reviews.author: Koeniginchen

customer_reviews.title: Not as pictured.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered two of these racks. The first one was a single unit and very sturdy and well made. I liked it so much that I ordered a second rack a couple months later. The newest one came in two parts that had to be screwed together, but the two parts didn't match up and the metal on the one part was bent. It's not the same product at all. The new one would have bowed out and looked ridiculous and I am returning it.
customer_reviews.author: Scotty

customer_reviews.title: Very satisfied and just right for what I was looking for.
customer_reviews.text: Its just what I needed to organize my spices, and it fits just right in the spot where I would like to hang it. Appreciate the template to help with the hanging, and the screws to go along with the rack, works for me. I did not get paid to write this review, this is my honest opinion, I like to give kudos when deserved. I checked around and read different reviews and like this price the best for what I was getting. I am thinking of getting a second rack for my essential oils, which I could really use.
customer_reviews.author: Sydney Hope

customer_reviews.title: Not as pictured.
customer_reviews.text: The item I received wasn't as described or pictured. I thought it was one piece, but it came in two pieces. The middle screws were too small to keep the pieces together, and it came apart after hanging. I had to find two other screws to anchor the middle part to the wall. Instead of four holes, I now have six. Fortunately, it's hanging in my pantry where it won't be seen by most. Positive aspects are: the shelves are deep and tall, allowing for storage of many sizes of jars/containers.
customer_reviews.author: Christine Shield

customer_reviews.title: I love a company that cares enough to cover all bases
customer_reviews.text: I finally had an opportunity to hang my rack. Not only is this rack higher quality ~ but clearly they thought of everything. It came with screws and a guide for hanging. After I started putting the large screw in I realized the screw was too long for my cabinet door. Figured I would have to wait until I could go to the store. I looked at the bag it came with and sure enough they even included smaller screws! I love a company that cares enough to cover all bases, so rare these days. Not only did I order a second one I came back to order one for a gift!
customer_reviews.author: I think the Cat's Gone Mad!

customer_reviews.title: Versatile
customer_reviews.text: I love this and will probably buy a second one! You can nail this into the wall, I just have mine standing on its own and it balances just fine. Enough room for two rows of smaller spices and can hold big spices very easily. I love that the second row is detachable making it versatile and great for bigger spices!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Attractive and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: I was very happy to find this rack. It's size was exactly what I wanted, I needed one that was not so wide, as I wanted to mount it on the side of my cabinets, this fit perfectly. It has been hard to find one less than 16" wide. It is a good quality and is sturdier than expected. Very satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Jean K

customer_reviews.title: Cute and functional
customer_reviews.text: This is a great little rack! Needed something small enough for our pantry door to free up space for smaller items that get lost. I may end up buying one or two more. Only downfalla are where the mounting holes are located behind the baskets but we managed to get it installed. And also the baskets could be a tad bigger. It's pretty sturdy, however with this type of material I wouldnt recommend putting heavy stuff in it.
customer_reviews.author: jen

customer_reviews.title: Spice Rack
customer_reviews.text: A PERFECT addition to organizing my spices from on a shelf to on the wall. More space on my shelf now and my spices look really nice, holds all different sizes and widths too! Super easy to put together and install, hardware included, looks wonderful, a definite Winner!! Highly Recommend
customer_reviews.author: Wendy

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: I have tons of spices and have a spice rack in the pantry area, but wanted one that I could mount inside a cabinet under my cooktop for the ones I use frequently. Wanted something that I could put the original containers on without having to fill 'spice jars'. This works great !
customer_reviews.author: pjpricetx

customer_reviews.title: Excellent storage capacity.
customer_reviews.text: This was a second purchase from this company. It arrived and was welded crooked. We didn't want to wait to return item, so my husband did his best to repair storage shelves.
customer_reviews.author: GABADA

customer_reviews.title: Missing a mount hole.  Not good.
customer_reviews.text: Mounting tab missing on one corner. The top shelf allows almost unlimited height for seasonings but the bottom racks limit the height of taller jars. These are much better than those rickety plastic seasoning drawers but poor welding on the mount holes.
customer_reviews.author: CatDaddy & Biatch

customer_reviews.title: Reorganizes the top of your oven!
customer_reviews.text: I had to get rid of all the junk lying on top of my stove, so I purchased this with fingers crossed. It does a pretty good job with easy installation (can use basic nails instead of mounting). Harder to hold large bottles, but perfect for standard and small size bottles!
customer_reviews.author: Karley Quartararo

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Very cute design, I just wish the spices were more secure in the rack! I find that they wobble around a bit too much and would love to be able to fit more spices in it. Overall I love it, great addition to my kitchen wall and so cute!! I will be using this for a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for Bathroom!
customer_reviews.text: I wanted some slim shelving for my everyday bathroom items that I keep on our counter... this is exactly what I wanted and was the perfect size for the wall! I get to keep slim bottles of lotion/sprays up top, and all my smaller items in the other shelves. I got my counter space back and everything is in complete reach! Amazon for the win! (As always!)
customer_reviews.author: MLB

customer_reviews.title: Spice spice baby!
customer_reviews.text: I love this spice rack! It has lots of room and i can fit so much on it, attached it to my wall with two command sticky hooks in order not to damage my wall! It does come with a traditional hook though. Beautiful color, compliments any kitchen.
customer_reviews.author: Bailey

customer_reviews.title: Looks great but poor quality
customer_reviews.text: It's a great spice rack and is exactly what I wanted, however it arrived bent. I was able to bend the frame back to a useable state, but it's still crooked. For a cheap spice rack, it's great. But if you're a stickler for symmetry I would recommend finding a higher quality one.
customer_reviews.author: Abigail Clingenpeel

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: Came in excellent condition and it's just what I was looking for.
customer_reviews.author: ms10

customer_reviews.title: Think tea box organizer- not just a spice rack!
customer_reviews.text: This product is the best kept secret as a tea box organizer for the side of your kitchen cabinets, freeing up counter and cupboard space. I love, love, it, and so do all who see it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very nice shelves
customer_reviews.text: Placed these shelves all over my camper, where others were to large. Definitely would order again. They look so nice.
customer_reviews.author: Ruth Seither

customer_reviews.title: Two rows can fit on each shelf.
customer_reviews.text: Using this to hold nail polish. Will have to purchase another shortly as I'm just fitting all of them in here. There's enough space for two rows of polish on each shelf. Easy to hang (I used the command hooks so I didn't damage my apartment walls.)
customer_reviews.author: Adjip

customer_reviews.title: Holds my amber bottles perfectly
customer_reviews.text: I purchased some glass amber bottles to put my supplements in (to get them out of PLASTIC) and I wanted something nice to organize and display them. This works perfectly. The only thing I don't care for is that it is a two piece item held together by some super tiny screws. I'm thinking of mounting it to a piece of wood to make sure it stays secure or mounting it inside a little cabinet which would keep it sturdy and also reduce light exposure on my supplements.
customer_reviews.author: Missy Jo

customer_reviews.title: Love the style and color!!
customer_reviews.text: It is the perfect size for the area that it was hung in. It had all the screws that it needed and also a sheet that you could put up on the wall to mark where the screws went. It is very study and holds the main spices that I use all the time. I will end up getting another one for my other spices that are only used for certain things and time of the year. I would tell anyone to buy this because it is great. The color is wonderful and matches everything in my kitchen.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Crowe

customer_reviews.title: Loved it
customer_reviews.text: I live in an apartment so space is small. Decided to buy these to organize my face creams and make up and to make it more easily accessible vs having it tucked away in a makeup bag. I think they are great and I am able to fit everything in it. Also since we are not allowed to make any holes in my wall I used 3lb command strips. Definitely recommend this item.
customer_reviews.author: Liliana

customer_reviews.title: good spice rack if you dont have a ton of spices
customer_reviews.text: we mounted this to the wall to hold our spices. the shelves arent very big & you can only put one row of spices on each rack. we love spices so unfortunately it doesnt fit all of our spices but it is very cute & was very easy to mount to the wall
customer_reviews.author: Tatum

customer_reviews.title: Love it.
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for daughters bathrooms. Finally have everything off the counter. Holds everything form lotions to hair spray. Only complaint is that it wasn’t easy to install, took some time cause of the position of the screws with the wiring. Was happy they are black wire and not brownish. I wanted black.
customer_reviews.author: Mom5

customer_reviews.title: Solid Product
customer_reviews.text: Good solid wall spice rack. Did its job and I appreciate that it came with wall anchors. You can't double the smaller spices on the racks, there is only enough width to make one line. If it were a half inch more extended I could probably double its carrying capacity, but I'm not too upset about it. Solid product.
customer_reviews.author: Rebeca

customer_reviews.title: Excellent.
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I was looking for in a spice rack. The shelves have plenty of clearance for wide and/or tall bottles and small bottles remain stable on the mesh surface. Reasonably stylish without being overdone. The deep bronze color, very accurately depicted in the pictures really pops against my yellow wall. Surprisingly sturdy and carefully made, especially at such a reasonable price. No rough edges, sloppy welds, color variations or other indications of shoddy workmanship. There were no studs where I wanted to mount it so I had to use the anchors. Idiot proof installation, very secure. After a couple of months, I'm still very happy with the upgrade from my old cramped and flimsy wood rack.
customer_reviews.author: Nathan

customer_reviews.title: It racks
customer_reviews.text: I'm actually using it for prescriptions and supplements and it holds more than I thought and bigger bottles than I expected.
customer_reviews.author: C. Murphy

customer_reviews.title: Easy access to spices
customer_reviews.text: I bought two of these, and put one on each cabinet beside the kitchen sink. They look beautiful, and allow me easy access to spices, and got them out of the cabinet. I installed them myself and they were so easy. They hold up really well, both are completely full of spice jars.
customer_reviews.author: Yvonne In Bend

customer_reviews.title: Worth buying a second one.
customer_reviews.text: Hi, I liked this spice rack enough to buy another one. Not that it isn't roomy. I just use a lot of different spices. I got these French square spice jars [on Amazon of course], and I can put about one dozen on one rack, but I wanted room for more so ordered another 3-tier rack. Anyway, this DecoBros spice rack is an elegant design. It is easy to install on the wall, and it fits both wider or narrower spice jars.
customer_reviews.author: Rifqah

customer_reviews.title: Love this! It would fit at the end of ...
customer_reviews.text: Love this! It would fit at the end of an upper kitchen cabinet, but with our layout, it looked a bit odd as it comes right to the edge. However, it fits under our microwave shelf and we have it just sitting on the countertop. Works great for our purposes, and much better than digging around looking for spices!
customer_reviews.author: rhm

customer_reviews.title: Works fine just sitting on the countertop
customer_reviews.text: I rent and didn't want to place another hole in the wall. I've had this at the back of my kitchen counter for over a week and I'm thrilled to have access to all my spices now - no more rummaging through an overly crowded cabinet. It sits there fine - no need to mount it on a wall.
customer_reviews.author: Wendy

customer_reviews.title: Handy Storage
customer_reviews.text: Got this for a friend that had no storage for his spices. It was the perfect size for the wall space available and held several spice bottles. It was very easy to install and came with good instructions and the screws needed to mount. I definitely recommend this item.
customer_reviews.author: payton58

customer_reviews.title: Great little rack!
customer_reviews.text: I had too many spices to fit in my cabinet without them falling out on me every time I went to find one. We ended up mounting this rack on the outside end of the cabinet. I measured ahead of my ordering and it fit perfectly. Looks very nice!
customer_reviews.author: D. Wundrock

customer_reviews.title: Much smaller than expected
customer_reviews.text: Small and flimsy, was a pain to mount, felt like a bit of a waste of money. But it works.
customer_reviews.author: Toast

customer_reviews.title: I really like this rack
customer_reviews.text: I really like this rack. I like to cook, and have a very large selection of spices, taking up an entire three shelves in my kitchen and too much space in my pantry. So I decided to hang this at arms length from my prep and cooking area, and place the more frequently used spices in it. It was very easy to hang, and not only is it sturdy, and convenient, holding several shapes and sizes of containers, I get compliments from visitors - that was a pleasant surprise, as I was looking at this from a purely practical perspective.
customer_reviews.author: Ethan Henderson

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Value
customer_reviews.text: This rack is VERY well made. I have one mounted on my appliance closet door. I keep small appliance parts and accessories in it. Like, I have small pastry tips in jars, the unlock key for my juicer along with other small accessories at the ready. I also have one inside my pantry door for extra spices and condiments. This wall rack is sturdy, well made, and includes everything you need to hang it. I will be back for more.
customer_reviews.author: Glenjwc23

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase, exactly what I wanted.
customer_reviews.text: This spice rack is perfect! Holds a lot of spice containers, and is large enough to to hold the bigger containers, not just the small round type. Very sturdy and easy to install. They provide both short and long screws, so depending on where you are installing the rack, you have the necessary hardware. Love this spice rack!
customer_reviews.author: AmyC

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy & Light-Weight
customer_reviews.text: This spice rack is just the right size. It hangs on the inside of my pantry door and has freed up SO MUCH SPACE for me. It is sturdy, light-weight and extremely easy to install. Highly recommend this one. Great product 👍
customer_reviews.author: Jenna

customer_reviews.title: A great purchase !
customer_reviews.text: Love this rack!! It holds a variety of containers, the shelves are deep so I don’t have to worry about spices falling out, and it is the perfect color for my kitchen. I wish I had done this a long time ago! I can actually find my spices in the rack and cupboard!
customer_reviews.author: Pamela Z.

customer_reviews.title: The mounting is completely off
customer_reviews.text: It looks very nice and I want to love it, but the mounting is so off that it is not very functional.
customer_reviews.author: ~Niki

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I wanted.
customer_reviews.text: Strong and durable, and exactly as described. Plenty of room for my everyday spices, and I don't have to constantly spend my time filling up generic bottles, I can just place them on the rack as I buy them. Perfect size, would definitely recommend this to a friend. Simplistic with a hint of country flair.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra D. Lane

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this rack and I will be getting a couple more. I bought it, of course, for my kitchen spices, but it didnt make it that far. It's perfect for little pots of newly bought small plants!
customer_reviews.author: Shawna

customer_reviews.title: 2 pieces
customer_reviews.text: I didn’t realize that it was divided into 2 sections and each had to be hung separately. I just wired the 2 pieces together. I could see hanging 2 pieces if what you were hanging was heavy . I still like it for storing spices.
customer_reviews.author: G. Fischer

customer_reviews.title: Great addition to a kitchen of a short cook... Lol
customer_reviews.text: I originally ordered 2 shelves because, well, I am vertically challenged... It was always a huge task to reach my spices... Great price, 2 day shipping free, and arrived on time... They come already assembled, complete with hardware to hang them... Upon hanging them, we found they wasn't hanging straight... We found the frame on both was a bit shifted, making it hang crooked... My husband just used his hands to straighten them and all is golden. Pretty design and I can reach my spices with ease... I would definitely buy them again... When we get our new house built, I will buy more... Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: Renae Hux

customer_reviews.title: Cute
customer_reviews.text: I like it. I bought the bronze and got black. I didn't want to deal with the return and getting another one process though.
customer_reviews.author: At

customer_reviews.title: Works great for holding tea boxes!
customer_reviews.text: We bought two of these to hold our collection of tea. We were able to fit 3 boxes standing vertically on each shelf. It's really nice that the shelves have a front edge/lip so that nothing falls out. Installation was easy. Each shelf needs 4 screws to be attached to the wall, and with each shelf they send you 10 screws - 5 that can be screwed into drywall, and 5 that can be screwed into wood. Very nice that that would be provided. We love how they look and keep things organized.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa K

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for the bathroom
customer_reviews.text: I bought two of these to mount in my bathroom for extra storage since I have no medicine cabinet. They were pretty easy to install. But the mounting holes are pretty close to the edge of the shelves so I had to screw in the screws by hand because my drill wouldnt fit. To mount two of these perfectly it took about an hour. Aside from slight installation pains in my fingers I am so happy with them. The shelves are wide enough to fit my jars of cream and sturdy enough to hold multiple products. I will be recommending these in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Widman

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: This worked so well. It's cute. It held about 6-7 spice jars per row. One of the best purchases I made. Really great for apartment living because it gives you more counter space.
customer_reviews.author: Autumn

customer_reviews.title: Finally Found the ONE!!
customer_reviews.text: Over 2yrs., I researched high and low for a good quality shelf organizer to hold nail polish. THIS product is outstanding, it's wel built and the bottom is level and not wavy due to cheap metal. It's deep enough to hold 2 bottles and they look nice when stored, it doesn't look like a mess. I will be getting another one of these for my spices and other various items. I highly recommend. I'm not one to write reviews, so either the product has to be horrible ir great and this product is great and well made.
customer_reviews.author: compdynamics

customer_reviews.title: they do not sit perfectly flat
customer_reviews.text: It said it would sit flatly on a hard surface. I did not want to hang it and the bottoms were not perfectly flat. They rocked and ahd to be anchored to the wall anyway. They arrived early and look nice. dimensions were correct
customer_reviews.author: Gramma D

customer_reviews.title: Not what is pictured
customer_reviews.text: I cannot put nails on my rental apartment. This is why I needed a 3 tier spice rack in one piece. My plan was to put the rack on the wall by using heavy duty command hooks. Neither in the description nor in the pictures it was shown that this 3 tier rack is in fact a 2 tier rack plus a single layer rack. You have to nail the separate racks on the wall (hooks don't fit) to make a 3 tier rack. Completely different from what is shown and stated in the description. I was expecting a one part item, not this. Beware.
customer_reviews.author: A.Kln

customer_reviews.title: perfect
customer_reviews.text: It is a perfect spice rack. I was looking for a dpace I can store my spices without having them fall all over. It has helped me have space in my drawers for other stuff.
customer_reviews.author: Meenakshi Sharma

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with the purchase given the quality of the rack ...
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with the purchase given the quality of the rack and it's color. Ordered two and decided I could use a third one. Unfortunately, my third rack came with silver screws instead of bronze screws like the prior two racks. That's kind of a poor packaging overview. Otherwise they look great and we are very happy with the racks. Great size for the Nakpunar 6 pcs Glass Spice Jars with Shakers (Black).
customer_reviews.author: johnalan

customer_reviews.title: Well made, my big bottles fit on top row.
customer_reviews.text: Very nice. My big bottles fit on the top row. One star off for where the screw mounts are located, can't hardy get a drill or a screw driver to the screw to install.
customer_reviews.author: Denise Lynn

customer_reviews.title: Wall Mounted Spice Rack
customer_reviews.text: Received rack in great condition, was easy to mount on wall next to my stove. Being short it makes it so much easier to get my spices...Tks for making and design.
customer_reviews.author: smanc0

customer_reviews.title: Stores larger spice bottles
customer_reviews.text: I bought two of these by accident but decided to keep both. They hold a lot of the spices that come in larger containers. The second one is used in the bedroom to hold hair and skin products.
customer_reviews.author: Dragon Serving Tea

customer_reviews.title: Bought a second one
customer_reviews.text: I should've believed the other comments about buying multiples. After mine arrived and I started putting spices in it, I promptly ordered a second one. One of the best features is the height between the shelves.
customer_reviews.author: H

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Solution for Pantry Organization
customer_reviews.text: Our apartment pantry is very plain with no shelves. We have been storing our spices and small stuff in small baskets and that was making it hard to find what we needed. These are just perfect for getting the spices and other stuff, including the pantry organized. The size is also perfect for us. They come with screws but we used 3M hooks because we didn’t want putting holes in the apartment wall. So far they seem to hold well.
customer_reviews.author: Driver Success

product_meta.title: DecoBros 3 Tier Wall Mounted Spice Rack, Bronze
product_meta.description: DecoBros 3 Tier Spice Rack is a high quality and well functional spice rack.
feature_bullets: Multi-purpose elegant rack for spice bottles, jelly jar or nail polish bottles
Sturdy steel-wire construction with fine bronze finish
Mounts on the wall. All mounting hardware (screws/wall anchors) included
Dimension: 11''L X 3.5''D X 17.5''H, (3.5'' depth holds up to 3.1'' diameter bottle/jar)
USPTO Patent USD753939 ;* Spice Jars are NOT Included

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.7 out of 5 stars4,108 ratings4.7 out of 5 stars
